response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its unique features and unparalleled performance, we believe its value far surpasses $12,000. Considering its exceptional capabilities and the benefits it can bring to you, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is a limited-time offer, and I'm confident it will provide you with significant value. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 15000}
